result.execSummary:
The defendant Paul Olivas III was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of Cocaine/Coca [Modifiers: Repeater, PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(c).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Costs to be paid in full by 12-01-2022 or penalty of civil judgment entered for non payment.
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
Straight Time. Sentence credit of 76 days was granted. TIME SERVED.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Paul Olivas III

records.addlTxt: with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

10:33 AM Defendant Paul Olivas III in court.  Attorney Steven Hughes in court for Paul Olivas III.  Prosecuting attorney Lindsey Hirt in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Parties have reached an agreement.  
Court conducts plea colloquy.  Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count 3.  Court finds defendant guilty.  Count 4 is dismissed and read in.
Recommendations by the State.  Recommendations by the Defense.  Statement by defendant.

The Court Orders the Following:

Count 3:
76 Days Jail.  (Credit - 76 days).  COURT DEEMS TIME SERVED.

COSTS: $243.00
	
DNA Surcharge: $ 200.00

DNA Sample ordered and to be provided immediately if in custody or within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department. 
 
Total costs/fine/forfeiture: to be paid by 12/1/22.   Failure to pay: will result in a civil judgment.

WCS Non-Compliance Report dated October 26, 2022, received and filed.

**Reviewed by Judge Bohren on October 26, 2022 - Court will review on 1-27.**

11:23 AM Defendant Paul Olivas III in court.  Prosecuting attorney Peter Michael Tempelis in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Attorney Hughes has not appeared and does not seem to be scheduled in any other court at this time.
Court will reschedule this matter to a time Attorney Hughes is already scheduled in this court.
Hearing scheduled for October 27, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Defendant's Demand for Discovery and Inspection
records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Defendant to comply with I.D. Processing. Defendant is not to use/possess any controlled substances without a valid prescription and take as prescribed. Defendant not to possess any drug paraphernalia. Absolute sobriety, defendant is not to possess or consume any alcohol. Defendant to report/comply with Wisconsin Community Services Pretrial Supervision Program under Level 2 supervision. The defendant is ordered to comply with drug testing through WCS. Drug testing frequency pursuant to Pretrial Supervision Program protocols. Defendant to pay costs associated with drug testing. Defendant to report to WCS within 48 hours after their release from custody.

1:23 PM Defendant Paul Olivas III in court, in custody. District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin by Julian Marrufo. Attorney Justin Griffis in Court with the defendant as a friend of the Court. Defendant is not eligible for State Public Defender representation. Defense acknowledges receipt of complaint and waives reading of complaint. Service admitted/advised of charges and potential penalties. Court advises of right to an attorney. NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED BY COURT.
Hearing scheduled for October 19, 2022 at 10:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Paul Olivas III
Current: N707 State Road 67, Ixonia, WI 53036 United States  (Effective: 09-02-2022)
Prior: 115 S First St #105, Watertown, WI 53094
To Seal Victim/Witness Identification Key, signed by Judge Michael O. Bohren on July 19, 2022
Victim/Witness Identification Key filed, under seal,  by the District Attorney's office.
